document.title: WIDA English Language Development Standards Framework, 2020 Edition Kindergarten—Grade 12

C15A3F7F2C0D4EE6A8945ED3C3F70600.description:
Show relationships between claim,
evidence, and reasoning

84F7D2939C36477FA69A2F50C00B57B6.description:
Select relevant information to
support claims with evidence from
one or more sources

31BA420216F84DDAACAED7495BE334B2.description:
Evaluating source credibility based on distinctions
between fact and opinion

92557E4BD3D9437CAAFCC5240B5B4600.description:
Analyzing relevant information from one or
two sources to develop claims in response to
compelling questions

D4FBBA20BD0249BAA2F5A79611AD6C2D.description:
Identifying topic and purpose (argue in favor
or against a position, present a balanced
interpretation, challenge perspective)

5D8D01069A88496B9149C69045B6D367.description:
Generalize possible reasons for a
development or event

91D583EC9540488392E7CEB5EDB47F28.description:
Describe components, order,
causes, or cycles

D39161B6C427432486E8CE9A7D5BDE31.description:
Evaluating disciplinary concepts and ideas
associated with a compelling or supporting
question

C73A6CE5F85549B0930489649EF9218A.description:
Analyzing sources for event sequences and/or
causes/effects

AB2F77A4563344E2A5DC1D00CE6D8374.description:
Determining types of sources for answering
compelling and supporting questions about
phenomena or events

8715F9973C2D4491BB726E47E8F612EF.description:
Signal logical relationships among reasoning,
evidence, data, and/or a model when making
a claim

46BBB43C0AEC4899B36F890051A1BCE0.description: Make a claim supported by relevant evidence

467F5975B6CE4ED486DAA0720B7B1A1E.description:
Introduce topic/phenomenon for an issue
related to the natural and designed world(s)

EEC9E58E3B7B4D298B2C8E4F828D665A.description:
Analyzing whether evidence is relevant or
not

6FF80E9A5F594F9DA9FB5D9DFB6582E1.description:
Identifying potential evidence from
data, models, and/or information from
investigations of phenomena or design
solutions

5D8BCAD7244E4495AD40179AAC07B99F.description:
Compare multiple solutions to a problem
considering how well they meet the
criteria and constraints of the design
solution

6EED9116A84F450FB102B46D7DACA654.description:
Develop a logical sequence between
data or evidence and claim

F8D4A6D0DC484A7D8234515352C82CFD.description:
Describe observations and/or data about
a phenomenon

8DCCF99846F8436FB96F7ADDFC8DFFEA.description:
Identifying information from observations
as well as evidence that supports particular
points in explanations

F93B3B8B4F384D79A9D2A98EE793C911.description:
Obtaining and combining information from
observations, and using evidence to help
explain how or why a phenomenon occurs

7DB92C69D52048979FBF51A208431949.description:
Defining investigable questions or simple
design problems based on observations,
data, and prior knowledge about a
phenomenon

B29D0136A9DA44AF90D0086BB5BDE5E0.description:
Identify and respond to others’
arguments

279A0E26794640E49CF3D0EDECEA4BAB.description:
Justify conclusion steps and strategies in
simple patterns

34E96726F7284BFEBED1E58B5AF91132.description:
Extracting mathematical operations and
facts from solution strategies to create
generalizations

7EB741E449DB4E83A95D556DE049C072.description:
Distinguishing connections among ideas in
justifications

5BFE2F8B704249A9869F5189574ECAA2.description:
Identifying conjectures about what might be
true

C347492EE7EB4026A73677F6264C64C6.description: State reasoning used to generate solution

124D4602D4614A73955057EC5C6EF61F.description:
Describe solution and steps used to solve
problem with others

1C73E3E77C284ABBBA7431E1A6597B5C.description:
Develop coherence and cohesion
throughout text

817E7CB242D04CC5B4B65DA8A57CF571.description:
Add details to define, describe, compare,
and classify topic and/or entity

ED7DF21B2CA442458A819750DD6AEABC.description:
Introduce and define topic and/or entity for
audience

5CBA860DFA534A33A82F53EF14F057D7.description:
Construct informational texts in language
arts that

B3E3D6A6213042A788F475C7BC5E19D6.description:
Describing relationship between a
series of events, ideas or concepts, or
procedural steps

71D563B08AC04BCB9FEE84F96C9DD2D5.description:
Referring explicitly to descriptions
for themes and relationships among
meanings

56923438245042BF8D6F7AFBCA9C4A18.description: Identifying the main idea and key details

98C9708A224A489397D37578FE83ED99.description:
Interpret informational texts in language
arts by

656EBEEB77D54CA2AEBB95C399A45E2A.description:
Develop story with time and event
sequences, complication, resolution or
ending

4FC8D65AFCCA4E61B70C1D2ECB1EFD29.description:
Determining the meaning of words and phrases
as they are used in texts, distinguishing literal
from nonliteral language

E40F0AAF583640979CD0DC2A9048FFB2.description:
Identifying how character attributes and
actions contribute to event sequences

69F2AFEDE3034F8C9CD0DE85DF55F2CF.description: Identifying a central message from key details

85987F4A612A4E008D3211E3A1EDC275.description: Revise one’s own opinions based on new information

7ACFD10BE5694C89B55CF3EB7E22C724.description: Defend change in one’s own thinking

CF02CC825CC643B0A77C36B5AC9C0324.description: Clarify and elaborate ideas based on feedback

01B6E8B559944566904CEB460E997E17.description: Act on feedback to revise understandings of how or why something works

4D1041E3B1CC4F13BF4174650CE720BB.description: Compare and contrast objects or concepts

024186DA37004508B2AA443B5D33B917.description: Follow and describe cycles in diagrams, steps in procedures, or causes and effects

CFAA75FCBE03432EAC810B5F82188BCD.description: Summarize information from interaction with others and from learning experiences

6BD2416C3F0C4F3AAE7AAF9DB0F6DFB6.description: Define and classify objects or concepts

9E58AF0F1B9B484DAFD96978EDBFDE43.description: Discuss how stories might end or next steps

5A42F77214FC43538C39D355F113DFFB.description: Ask questions about what others have shared

75A0D4CEE925472A82A6159D313501F1.description: Connect stories with images and representations to add meaning

218AF01CA2084842AC009EB24FB991EA.description: Share ideas about one’s own and others’ lived experiences and previous learning
